Product Name: Hanes Men’s Ultimate Cotton Heavyweight Pullover Hoodie SweatshirtHoody
Product Description: Add comfort and warmth to your casual wardrobe with a Hanes EcoSmart® men's hoodie. Super soft and cozy, this hooded pullover is made with cotton sourced from American farms for a feel-good finish. Crafted with the Hanes quality you expect, it's made to hold its shape thanks to double-needle stitching at the neck and armholes. You'll appreciate classic hoodie details like ribbed cuffs and hem and a front kangaroo pocket. The perfect layering piece, this warm men's fleece sweatshirt is sure to become your new go-to sweatshirt.
About Product: FLEECE TO FEEL GOOD ABOUT – EcoSmart mid-weight cotton/poly fleece with up to 5% of the poly fibers.
CLASSIC SILHOUETTE – Basic hoodie shaping for that sporty look you love.
MADE TO STAY SOFT – Pill-resistant durable fleece stays warm and cozy.
HOLDS ITS SHAPE - Thanks to ribbed cuffs and hem.
MADE TO LAST - Double-needle stitching at the neck and armhole seams for quality and durability, plus a dyed-to-match drawstring at the hood.
CONVENIENT TEARAWAY TAGS - Getting rid of itchy tags is super easy. Simply tear it off for comfort that lasts all day.

Reviews.Review Body: Basic, comfy, durable. No frills. Good length on arms, and the elastic cuffs stay comfortably in place if you have shorter arms. I found it kept me warm over an Alberta winter working on a dock, sometimes outdoors without a coat. But cool enough to wear in the evening during the warmer months of the year. It's currently my favourite hoody.
Good quality. Medium weight material. True fit. These do shrink a bit but not too bad. They as pretty soft and durable. Definitely worth their price.

Delivered on time (thanks Amazon)This is definitely more of a spring, fall and cool summer evening sweatshirt as it is not very thick. It also fits smaller than stated, my wife likes men's sweatshirts and normally wears a medium because she prefers a loose fit but purchased a large and it is a snug fit. The quality seems to be good and she loves the color, just remember to go about 2 sizes up over store bought sweatshirts.

Definitely doesn’t fit like a men’s sweater. It’s very cozy and a nice sweater but it was way too short for my boyfriend. I however love it for myself but I am a woman so it fits me better than my boyfriend lol

I specifically ordered this sweatshirt because it stated that it was 100% cotton. (Product details as read on the product page)Fabric type 100% CottonCare instructions Machine WashClosure type Pull OnWeave type KnitBut the label upon receipt read 50% cotton and 50% polyester. It's very light, doesn't hang well and smelled of chemicals. So buyer beware. I'm not going to send it back as it's a pain to do so, but I will NEVER order a Hanes product from Amazon again.
Nice and soft, colour is perfect match
